Cyclosporiasis (Tests for Cyclospora cayetanensis Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    10850-6 Cyclospora cayetanensis [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    41436-7 Cyclospora cayetanensis DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    82206-4 Cyclospora cayetanensis DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with non-probe detection
